directions: Muddle mint leaves and simple syrup in a julep cup or rocks glass. Add Champagne, cognac, and bitters. Fill glass partway with crushed ice and stir gently to combine. Mound more crushed ice on top and garnish with a mint sprig and a lemon twist.
ingredients: 6 mint leaves, plus sprig for serving
3 ounces Champagne or dry sparkling wine
title: Sparkling Julep
